sentences.en: At last Ann had him at vantage again, and was before him.
sentences.cn: 安终于再度占了他的上风, 走在他的前面.

sentences.en: At last she had him at vantage again, and was before him.
sentences.cn: 她终于再度占了他的上风, 走在他的前面.

sentences.en: From that vantage point he could survey the whole valley.
sentences.cn: 从那个观察点,他可以监视整个山谷.

sentences.en: From that vantage point, he shrewdly harnessed his new influence in the struggle against the dominant Yankee establishment.
sentences.cn: 他机敏地利用了这一任职优势，在和那些美国大家族企业的斗争中施加自己的影响力。

sentences.en: From the vantage point of a window seat, you can survey the slums.
sentences.cn: 从靠窗座位你可以居高临下俯瞰贫民窟.

sentences.en: From their vantage - point on the cliff, they could watch the ships coming and going.
sentences.cn: 他们在悬崖上居高临下, 能看到来来往往的船.

sentences.en: Maybe it is bad to them, but it is just our vantage.
sentences.cn: 或许对他们是坏事, 但对我们正是优势.

sentences.en: Over the centuries the vantage point for watching the tides has changed.
sentences.cn: 钱塘观潮的地点,古今有所不同.

sentences.en: Related international chain brand hotel working experience is an vantage.
sentences.cn: 有国际品牌连锁酒店工作经验者优先.

sentences.en: Since you have no vantage, you have to make great effort.
sentences.cn: （既然）你没有优势，你（就）必须努力。

sentences.en: The cafe was a good vantage point for watching the world go by.
sentences.cn: 从这家小餐馆能清楚地看到世事的变迁。

sentences.en: The conservation law provides a perspective from the vantage point of experiment.
sentences.cn: 守恒定律提供了从实验这个有利地位观察到的图景.

sentences.en: The famous athlete had no vantage to win the game.
sentences.cn: 那个有名的运动员已经没有优势赢得那场比赛了。

sentences.en: The kernel of that message was that peace must not be a source of advantage or disad-vantage for anyone.
sentences.cn: 那一信息的核心是和平绝不应该成为对任何人有利或不利的根源。

sentences.en: The warden took us to a vantage point on the slopes where we saw herring gulls on the rocks below.
sentences.cn: 管理员把我们带到斜坡上的一处有利位置，我们从那里看到了下面岩石上的银鸥。

sentences.en: This vantage readily accepts ambiguities and the counteracting forces in nature.
sentences.cn: 这种优势,可让他们轻易接受自然界的模?两可及相互对抗的力量.

sentences.en: Unity based thought - form perceives the human dance from a new vantage - point.
sentences.cn: 基于统一的思想模式从崭新的视角理解人类之舞.

sentences.en: We took the enemy at vantage.
sentences.cn: 我们冷不防地袭击了敌人.

trans.tran_en: a state, position, or opportunity affording superiority or advantage
